EmailTemplate.subject: UPDATED: Contrat pour produits de bureau
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultez l'offre en ligne <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Le NOUVEAU Contrat pour produits de bureau est maintenant disponible!
Découvrez des articles de choix à bas prix de tous les jours. NMSO: E60PD-19OSFB/001/PD Date d'expiration: 30 septembre 2020 <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/writing-deal-centre-February-18-offer-3.aspx?cmp=EBTAXFEB18EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Magasiner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/Account/Logon?cmp=EBFGOFFICEPRODUCTSFR&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Service à la clientèle <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Modalites <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Confidentialite <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> grandandtoy.com/gov <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/fr/sites/government/default.aspx]]>
Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-511-4534
